name.japanese: ラジアルエッジストーム

description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc,
attacks the target with full force. This move negates
the effect on the battlefield.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc,
attacks the target with full force. This move negates
the effect on the battlefield.
description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts damage and removes any terrain present on the battlefield.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts damage and removes any terrain present on the battlefield.
